thread.title: Getty Realty Corp. Announces Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: Getty Realty Corp. Announces Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
JERICHO, N.Y.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Getty Realty Corp. (NYSE:GTY) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.32 per common share payable on April 5, 2018, to holders of record on March 22, 2018.
About Getty Realty Corp .
Getty Realty Corp. is the leading publicly-traded real estate investment trust in the United States specializing in the ownership, leasing and financing of convenience store and gasoline station properties. As of December 31, 2017, the Company owned 828 properties and leased 79 properties from third-party landlords in 28 states across the United States and Washington, D.C.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180228006363/en/
